job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Software Engineer in ISE specializing in AI Platform, you willteam upwithotherISEengineerson customer engagements involving Microsofts AI offerings such as Azure ML, Azure Cognitive Services, Azure OpenAI, other related MS technologies such as Azure Cognitive Search or open source AI tooling.We understand that most technologies are evolving very quickly, so broad experience in the AI space and the ability to quickly upskill and unblock others is the key to success. By interacting with our customers engineering teams and Microsofts product engineering teams, you will develop real-world technical experience that helps customers grow their business and Microsoft to improve our products and services.

   Industry Solutions Engineering (ISE) is part of Microsoft Industry Solutions, a global organization of over 16,000 strategic sellers, industry experts, elite engineers, and world-class architects, consultants, and delivery experts who work together to bring Microsofts mission of empowerment and cutting-edge technology - to life for the worlds most influential customers.

   The ISE team works directly with customers looking to leverage the latest technologies to address their toughest challenges. We develop solutions side-by-side with our customers through collaborative innovation to solve their challenges. This work involves the development of broadly applicable, high-impact solution patterns and open-source software assets that contribute to the Microsoft platform. In this role, you will be working with engineers from your team and our customers teams to apply your skills, perspectives, and creativity to grow as engineers and help solve our customer challenges.

   Our team prides itself on embracing a growth mindset, inspiring excellence, and encouraging everyone to share their unique viewpoints and be their authentic selves. Join us and help create life-changing innovations that impact billions around the world!

   Watch this video to learn more about who we are and what we do:https://aka.ms/csevideo

   Responsibilities

   Understand User Requirements
     * Identify deep insights from customer engagements and partner with the product group on using customer needs and insights to guide future product roadmap

   Design
     * Participate in architecture design sessions and coding sprints working alongside ISE engineers and customer engineers to help them make good design decisions specifically around building good AI solutions, for example ML Ops. You will also partner closely with our data science team on customer engagements.

   Coding
     * Be a hands-on software engineer where needed, so youll need to be able to write quality code. We often bring Data & AI depth expertise to the existing ISE industry engineering crew that has end-to-end ownership of the customer engagement.
     * Collaborate with other members of the team and the broader organization to strategically invest in building reusable assets and playbooks built from our customer experiences.
job_details.full_text:
AI Platform Software Engineer

As a Software Engineer in ISE specializing in AI Platform, you willteam upwithotherISEengineerson customer engagements involving Microsofts AI offerings such as Azure ML, Azure Cognitive Services, Azure OpenAI, other related MS technologies such as Azure Cognitive Search or open source AI tooling.We understand that most technologies are evolving very quickly, so broad experience in the AI space and the ability to quickly upskill and unblock others is the key to success. By interacting with our customers engineering teams and Microsofts product engineering teams, you will develop real-world technical experience that helps customers grow their business and Microsoft to improve our products and services.

   Industry Solutions Engineering (ISE) is part of Microsoft Industry Solutions, a global organization of over 16,000 strategic sellers, industry experts, elite engineers, and world-class architects, consultants, and delivery experts who work together to bring Microsofts mission of empowerment and cutting-edge technology - to life for the worlds most influential customers.

   The ISE team works directly with customers looking to leverage the latest technologies to address their toughest challenges. We develop solutions side-by-side with our customers through collaborative innovation to solve their challenges. This work involves the development of broadly applicable, high-impact solution patterns and open-source software assets that contribute to the Microsoft platform. In this role, you will be working with engineers from your team and our customers teams to apply your skills, perspectives, and creativity to grow as engineers and help solve our customer challenges.

   Our team prides itself on embracing a growth mindset, inspiring excellence, and encouraging everyone to share their unique viewpoints and be their authentic selves. Join us and help create life-changing innovations that impact billions around the world!

   Watch this video to learn more about who we are and what we do:https://aka.ms/csevideo

   Responsibilities

   Understand User Requirements
     * Identify deep insights from customer engagements and partner with the product group on using customer needs and insights to guide future product roadmap

   Design
     * Participate in architecture design sessions and coding sprints working alongside ISE engineers and customer engineers to help them make good design decisions specifically around building good AI solutions, for example ML Ops. You will also partner closely with our data science team on customer engagements.

   Coding
     * Be a hands-on software engineer where needed, so youll need to be able to write quality code. We often bring Data & AI depth expertise to the existing ISE industry engineering crew that has end-to-end ownership of the customer engagement.
     * Collaborate with other members of the team and the broader organization to strategically invest in building reusable assets and playbooks built from our customer experiences.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and deploying AI solutions, with a specific mention of MLOps and partnering with data science teams. While it involves software engineering, the focus is on productionizing AI models and solutions rather than building user-facing applications from scratch, aligning more closely with the ML Engineer profile's emphasis on MLOps and model productionization.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Understand User Requirements' and 'Identify deep insights from customer engagements' directly relates to understanding business context and translating customer needs.

The phrase 'partner with the product group on using customer needs and insights to guide future product roadmap' indicates alignment with strategic goals and influencing product direction based on business needs.
job_tasks.phrase: partner with the product group on using customer needs and insights to guide future product roadmap

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Azure Cognitive Search' implies working with search technologies that often involve data indexing and retrieval, a component of data engineering.

The phrase 'building good AI solutions, for example ML Ops' and 'partner closely with our data science team on customer engagements' suggests involvement in the modeling process and collaboration with data scientists.
The phrase 'partner closely with our data science team on customer engagements' indicates collaboration on modeling tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: partner closely with our data science team on customer engagements

job_tasks.justification: The role is described as a 'Software Engineer' and requires being 'a hands-on software engineer where needed, so youll need to be able to write quality code.' This directly points to software development responsibilities.
job_tasks.phrase: Be a hands-on software engineer where needed, so youll need to be able to write quality code.

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'building reusable assets and playbooks' suggests developing software components that can be used across multiple projects.
The phrase 'specifically around building good AI solutions, for example ML Ops' directly mentions MLOps as a key area of focus.
